articles.author: Steven J. Horowitz
articles.title: No Doubt Dusts Off the Spiderwebs and Brings Rock Steady Vibes to Invigorating Coachella 2024 Set - Variety
articles.description: No Doubt reunited for the first time in nine years for an impassioned, invigorating set at Coachella 2024.
articles.content:
“I didn’t think this was really going to happen, did you?” shouted Gwen Stefani halfway through “Hella Good,” the opening song from No Doubt during their reunion set at Coachella 2024.
Indeed, it’s … [+4338 chars]
